message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $13,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I'm confident in the value this product brings, I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is my final offer, as I already have another interested buyer.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. My maximum price remains at $10,000. Let me know if there's any room for compromise.
